#summary Projects using pybox2d
#labels Featured

=== Libraries / Add-ons / Learning Utilities ===

 * [http://mekanimo.net/ Mekanimo] Simulation designer for games/learning/etc. with nice GUI and export options
 * [http://home.gna.org/box2dsimulator/Html/index.html Box2dSimulator] A 2D physics engine for long run robotic experiments
 * [http://code.google.com/p/pybox2d-foil/ pybox2d-foil] Airfoil physics simulation for pyBox2D by [http://code.google.com/u/snickell/ snickell]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/pytform/ pytform] Work in progress pyglet 2d polygon-based game development kit
 * [http://elements.linuxuser.at/ Elements] Work in progress simplified physics API (dead?)
 * [http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Physics_(activity) OLPC Physics Activity] Basis for the OLPC Physics [http://developers.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=08/08/18/2258228 Game Jam]

=== Games ===

 * [http://cd21.org/games/the-bird-eating-macaque/ The Bird-eating Macaque] by cap ([http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/2009/02/08/the-bird-eating-macaque-final/ LD page])
 * [http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/2008/08/10/junktowers-final/ Junktowers] by Papper, his submission to the 48 hour solo game development competition [http://www.ludumdare.com/ Ludum Dare]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gamecomp/ NaN]'s "The day mom tied us together", fun and innovative little side scroller (with a cool intro) ([http://www.pyweek.org/e/NaN7/ PyWeek page])
 * [http://nuigroup.com/forums/viewthread/3200/ tPhysics], a Multi-Touch Physics Sandbox. Video demo looks like fun! (should use b2PolygonDef.checkValues() to fix the polygon problems)

=== Up and Coming ===

Some WIP projects to keep an eye on:

 * [http://github.com/elemel elemel]'s 2D physics puzzle game [http://github.com/elemel/cannonball/tree Cannonball], and 2D platform RPG [http://github.com/elemel/mortified/tree/master mortified]
 * [http://github.com/ddunwoody/adastra adastra], by ddunwoody
 * [http://www.gamecreation.org/~quadropus/ Quadropus], a puzzle-platformer where the player must balance the use of four tentacles to solve a variety of environmental puzzles
